profile:
Welcome to Huvan Construction. We specialize in exterior finishing and decks. HUVAN Construction has been providing quality construction services to Calgary and area residents since 2000. Built on a legacy of quality workmanship we take the approach that no job is complete until our customer is totally satisfied. From planning and permits through to completion let us help you with your next project.

***

Our Services: 

Composite and Wood Decks

Exterior Battens, Decorative Columns, Finish Trim Work

Framing Projects (Basements, Sheds, Garages, Additions)

Exterior Renovations

***

We are now serving a much bigger area including Nanton, High River, Claresholm, Strathmore, Canmore, Sundre, Water Valley, etc.


Contact us today to schedule your appointment. We're looking forward to working with you.
